Advanced players¶

class coop.advanced_players.AdvancedPlayer(initial_position, goal_positions, walls, goal_choice=<class 'coop.strategies.NaiveStrategy'>)[source]¶

Class representing an advanced cooperative player that utilises a space-time reservation table to handle collisions, and that limits the path search depth

Attributes:
coop_period
next

Calculates this agent’s next position considering its current

next_position

Determines this agent’s position after taking its next.

others

The list of all the cooperative peers of this agent.

Methods

add_goal(goal_position) Adds a new goal to this agent.
clear_trace() Removes any trace of its use from the reservation table
collision(placed, following) Checks that this agent does not collide with any other.
find_path_to_goal([resume]) Finds a path to a goal for this agent considering its peers as potential obstacles
get_next_position() Pops the next step out of the list and takes it to calculate its next position.
get_position_after(reversed_steps) Determines this agent’s position after following the given step sequence.
go_through_one_another(other, placed) Tests whether this agent will have crossed the given one after the current iteration.
handle_collision(obstacle) Replans a part of this agent’s immediate path considering the given obstacle.
has_next_goal() Tests whether this agent has another goal to pursue.
has_next_step() Tests whether this agent has a planned step to take.
is_at_goal() Tests whether this agent has reached its goal.
is_last() Tests whether this agent is the last one in the list of players for the purpose of timer update
set_cooperation_period(coop_period) Sets the cooperative period for the agents of this class
set_cut_off_limit(cut_point) Sets the number of immediate steps to be recalculated when handling a collision.
set_search_epoch(search_epoch) Sets the search epoch, i.e.
set_search_epochs() Initialises the search epoch for each agent of this class so that there are approximately 2n/depth agents replanning at any epoch
clear_trace()[source]¶

Removes any trace of its use from the reservation table

find_path_to_goal(resume=True)[source]¶

Finds a path to a goal for this agent considering its peers as potential obstacles

args:
[optional] resume (bool): True iff the agent must resume its pursuit
of the current goal
is_last()[source]¶

Tests whether this agent is the last one in the list of players for the purpose of timer update

return:
(bool): whether this agent is the last in the list of players
next¶

Calculates this agent’s next position considering its current and remaining goals

return:
(tuple[int]): the next position of the agent
classmethod set_cooperation_period(coop_period)[source]¶

Sets the cooperative period for the agents of this class

set_search_epoch(search_epoch)[source]¶

Sets the search epoch, i.e. the time at which this agent will plan its path, and reserves its current position in the reservation table for all the epochs prior to the given search epoch

args:
search_epoch (int): the epoch at which this agent will plan its path to its current goal
classmethod set_search_epochs()[source]¶

Initialises the search epoch for each agent of this class so that there are approximately 2n/depth agents replanning at any epoch

class coop.advanced_players.TimeAStar(initial_state, goal_state, initial_epoch, player_id, walls, backwards_search, last_epoch=None)[source]¶

Class implementing the A* algorithm

Methods

add_to_open_set(states) Appends the given nodes to the fringe.
get_node_at(coordinates) Retrieves the node with the given coordinates in the closed set.
get_not_extended(states) Filters out already extended nodes from the given list of nodes.
get_reversed_step_sequence() Finds the step sequence to follow from the initial state in order to get to the goal state
open_set_is_empty() Tests whether the fringe is empty.
run([resume]) Runs A* algorithm
select_best() Selects the best node in the fringe on the basis of its f-value.
set_new_goal(new_goal) Sets the new goal for the A* algorithm.
true_distance  
get_reversed_step_sequence()[source]¶

Finds the step sequence to follow from the initial state in order to get to the goal state

return:
(list[tuple[int]]): the reversed list of steps to take to get
to the goal state from the initial state

Runs A* algorithm

return:
(list[tuple[int]]): the reversed list of steps to take to get
to the goal state from the initial state

get_step()[source]¶

Calculates the step to take to come to this node from its parent

return:
(tuple[int]): the step the agent must take to come to this node
from its parent
get_valid_neighbours(player_id)[source]¶

Finds all the valid neighbours of this node, i.e. those nodes wrapping non-wall and inside-the-grid cells

return:
(list[Node]): the list of all this node’s valid neighbours
h()[source]¶

Calculates the true distance heuristic value for this node, i.e. the exact distance between this node and the goalManhattan

return:
(int): the true distance heuristic value for this node
